ShortDescription: NOVO Consulting is an organisation which has been envisaged to partner with leading brands to create World Class Customer Experience at the point of sale by transforming their people and processes through strategic learning and technological interventions.
enhanced_description: Novo Management Consulting Pvt Ltd (NOVO Consulting), established in 2013, is a firm dedicated to partnering with leading brands to enhance customer experience at the point of sale. This is achieved by transforming client's people and processes through strategic learning and technological interventions. The company focuses on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, with a stated ambition to have been India's largest Automotive Training and Consulting company by 2018. Their services encompass comprehensive learning and development solutions, including the provision of training eLearning software, course authoring, and general training and development consulting.
